SA07n931:3: śrīmadabhayapranuraktajanaṃ sa vihāya niścitamanā vanaṃ yayau ||1 ||
SA07n931:5: prekṣya sa viṣayatṛṣākṛpaṇānanavasthitaṃ tapa iti nyavartata ||2 ||
SA07n931:8: sa vicārayan jagati kiṃ nu paramamiti taṃ tamāgamam |
SA07n931:9: niścayamanadhigataḥ parataḥ paramaṃ cacāra tapa eva duṣkaram ||4 ||
SA07n931:10: atha naiṣa mārga iti vīkṣya tadapi vipulaṃ jahau tapaḥ |
SA07n931:17: harṣatulamagaman muditā vimukhī tu mārapariṣat pracukṣubhe ||8 ||
SA07n931:18: sanagā ca bhūḥ pravicacāla hutabahasakhaḥ śivo vavau |
SA07n931:19: nedurapi ca suradundubhayaḥ pravavarṣa cāmbudharavarjitaṃ nabhaḥ ||9 ||
SA07n931:30: sa vinīya kāśiṣu gayeṣu bahujanamatho girivraje |
SA07n931:35: vastumatiśuci śivopavanaṃ sa dadarśa niḥspṛhatayā yathā vanam ||17 ||
SA07n931:38: pratipūjayā na sa jaharṣa na ca śucamavajñayāgamat |
SA07n931:43: śeṣamapi ca janamaśrumukhaṃ vininīṣayā gaganamutpapāta ha ||21 ||
SA07n931:44: sa vicakrame divi bhuvīva punarupaviveśa tasthivān |
SA07n931:46: salile kṣitāviva cacāra jalamiva viveśa medinīm |
SA07n931:47: megha iva divi vavarṣa punaḥ punarajvalannava ivodito raviḥ ||23 ||
SA07n931:49: taptakanakasadṛśaprabhayā sa babhau pradīpta iva sandhyayā ghanaḥ ||24 ||
SA07n931:53: paurajanamapi ca tatpravaṇaṃ nijagāda dharmavinayaṃ vināyakaḥ ||26 ||
SA07n931:55: dharmamatulamadhigamya munermuṃnaye nanāma sa yato gurāviva ||27 ||
SA07n931:61: kiṃ bata vipulaguṇaḥ kulajaḥ sadayaḥ sadā kimu munerupāsayā ||30 ||
SA07n931:65: naiva ca parayuvatīragamat paramaṃ hi tā dahanato'pyamanyata ||32 ||
SA07n931:66: anṛtaṃ jagāda na ca kaścidṛtamapi jajalpa nāpriyam |
SA07n931:67: ślakṣṇamapi ca na jagāvahitaṃ hitamapyuvāca na ca paiśunāca yat ||33 ||
SA07n931:68: manasā lulobha na ca jātu paravasuṣu gṛddhamānasaḥ |
SA07n931:69: kāmasukhamasukhato vimṛśan vijahāra tṛpta iva tatra sajjanaḥ ||34 ||
SA07n931:70: na parasya kaścidapaghātamapi ca saghṛṇo vyacintayat |
SA07n931:71: mātṛpitṛsutasuhṛtsadṛśaṃ sa dadarśa tatra hi parasparaṃ janaḥ ||35 ||
SA07n931:72: niyataṃ bhaviṣyati paratra bhavadapi ca bhūtamapyatho |
SA07n931:73: karmaphalamapi ca lokagatirniyateti darśanamavāpa sādhu ca ||36 ||
SA07n931:75: bhraṃśini śithilaguṇo'pi yuge vijahāra tatra munisaṃśrayājjanaḥ ||37 ||
SA07n931:77: sarvamaśivamavagamya bhavaṃ bhavasaṃkṣayāya vavṛte na janmane ||38 ||
SA07n931:79: strotasi hi vavṛtire bahavo rajasaṃstanutvamapi cakrire pare ||39 ||
SA07n931:81: tyāgāvinayaniyamābhirato vijahāra so'pi na cacāla satpathāt ||40 ||
SA07n931:82: api ca svato'pi parato'pi na bhayamabhavanna daivataḥ |
SA07n931:83: tatra ca susukhasubhikṣaguṇairjahṛṣuḥ prajāḥ kṛtayuge manoriva ||41 ||
SA07n931:84: iti muditamanāmayaṃ nirāpat kururaghupūrupuropamaṃ puraṃ tat |
SA07n931:85: abhavadabhayadaiśike maharṣau viharati tatra śivāya vītarāge ||42 ||
SA07n931:86: saundaranande mahākāvye 'tathāgata-varṇana' nāma tṛtīya sarga samāpta |
